name: Helping Hand - SSO Christmas fan-VisualNovel
description:
This is a very short Christmas themed Visual Novel based on one single chapter of the Fanfiction "Fated to be Doomed" by my dear friend.  Writing done by her, check the whole story out:

https://www.wattpad.com/story/283276881-fated-to-be-doomed-%E2%88%A3ydris-x-read...

Since it's based on a story, there are no choices to be made.

Characters belong to Starstable

I had no proofreaders or beta-players. There are some spelling mistakes, sorry
